system.weapons:
Pilot: 2x Long-Barrelled Autocannons (Front, 450m/5AU, Heavy, S/2/5, 4d10+5 I, Pen 4, Clip 500, Reload 2 Full)

Gunner: 2x Twin-Linked Heavy Bolters (Front-Left or Front-Right, 120m/2AU, Heavy, -/-/10, 2d10 X, Pen 5, Clip 400, Reload 3 Full).
system.specialRules: Is a Spacecraft, can act as Flyer or Skimmer in Atmosphere, following relevent rules and work in and out of atmosphere. When receiving Critical Hits not as a result of Righteous Fury, halve the result, rounding up.
system.traitsText: Is a Spacecraft, can act as Flyer or Skimmer in Atmosphere, following relevent rules and work in and out of atmosphere. When receiving Critical Hits not as a result of Righteous Fury, halve the result, rounding up.
